project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks users multiple-choice questions and keeps track of their score.

task.name: Design the structure of the quiz game, including how questions and answers will be stored.
Implement the logic to display questions to the user and collect their responses.
Implement the scoring system to keep track of correct answers.
Implement a feature to display the final score to the user at the end of the game.
Write tests to ensure that all components of the quiz game are functioning correctly.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
